data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lUY1MaYHqgEQ7kNvgGH2bN3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDVnnSQKjT0lEW0Ta8Gu2nYCsswZKpYMAt5WF2qNNkI8g&oe=6657121C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fz-S8st5ZyQQ7kNvgFe-l67&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvqlK2gsB2BwqjWweV_4VHo0WwYm3LikBoFPh7lSuhUQ&oe=66571BA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1C2Ph3TILLsQ7kNvgHd_KNg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9qfYlkB8kXPwvI_CgZcKwXUTaRI2wRqw52sN29IV1ww&oe=66570307)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Pd2oQmzXi-UQ7kNvgGQCKBz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAGgFP7H5F_DxyAVEM_qMQHJTK8Qk4gRFJCds2gQ6LHQQ&oe=6656F5E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fmlq4fKOoeUQ7kNvgHkNmHQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBpEvxa7b8tWlB5m58SzqG6_QO8GCwrv9MRoRMy9CqYtA&oe=66572258)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XXKtBKTk38IQ7kNvgHK8vry&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCmNch-UtMtxu5cm7Z-moG1OoxI94QvhPUaiuKfEvLgLA&oe=66571ED9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZdF4mfqaH_QQ7kNvgEyF5Yt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAqxZff4Y2SEyk-7P5U-Wh0mm5CwXaX_xDGDhpGF7lA-g&oe=665704F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=x9-dItFHoRgQ7kNvgF8ckUR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCGqJb5EwjzxbK0l-idtIwZKVdPOYZ4FtTAONd0dmbDsA&oe=6656EF6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RBVXnJVJnfQQ7kNvgH9uYoU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBjWdsNXpQ3BRHhyuNhYyi4DMwDNYQdWmNKG8AnrqcAyQ&oe=66570317)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1shvsZKuWCQQ7kNvgEx-Tzi&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA4ogdQRD4FlYYsZwuqI2maA94ez0oqBh3JZyg1ypENVw&oe=66571E8C)
